content.question: Which of the following biogeochemical cycles includes the processes of buffering ocean <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and photosynthesis, as shown in the diagram?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain relationships between different characteristics of environmental concepts, processes, or models represented visually. a. In theoretical contexts. b. In applied contexts.
